content: हरिण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [हृ-इनन्] {@--1@} Pale, whitish. {@--2@} Reddish or yellowish white. --णः {@--1@} A deer, an antelope; (said to be of five kinds: --हरिणश्चापि विज्ञेयः पंचभेदोऽत्र भैरव . ऋष्यः खड्गो रुरुश्चैव पृषतश्च मृगस्तथा <ls>Kālikā P.</ls>); अपि प्रसन्नं हरिणेषु ते मनः <ls>Ku. 5. 35.</ls> {@--2@} The white colour. {@--3@} A goose. {@--4@} The sun. {@--5@} Viṣṇu. {@--6@} Śiva.

हरिणी {@--1@} A female deer, doe; चकितहरिणीप्रेक्षणा <ls>Me. 82</ls>, <ls>R. 9. 55</ls>, <ls n="R.">14. 69.</ls> {@--2@} One of the four classes of women (also called चित्रिणी <ab>q. v.</ab>) {@--3@} Yellow jasmine. {@--4@} A good golden image. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of a metre. {@--6@} The green colour. {@--7@} Turmeric. {@--8@} Madder.

हरित {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ता|हरिणी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [हृ-इतच्] {@--1@} Green, of a green colour, verdant; रम्यांतरः कमलिनीहरितैः सरोभिः <ls>Ś. 4. 10</ls>; <ls>Ku. 4. 14</ls>; <ls>Me. 21</ls>; <ls>Ki. 5. 38.</ls> {@--2@} Tawny. {@--3@} Dark-blue. --तः {@--1@} The green colour. {@--2@} A lion. {@--3@} A kind of grass.
